newsitem.title: FRANCE: Lagardere MSI unit has three contracts.
newsitem.headline: Lagardere MSI unit has three contracts.

text.p: Matra Systemes & Information (MSI), a Lagardere unit specialising in ground systems for handling satellite data, said on Thursday it had won three contracts.

An MSI executive said the contracts totalled 50 million francs. MSI is modernising the Spot image handling systems of SICORP, a U.S. subsidiary of Spot Image, based in Reston Virginia. It is also upgrading the Spot data handling systems of Pakistan's Suparco (Space and Upper Atmosphere Research Commission), Lagardere said in a statement.
The third contract is for the installation of the CBERS acquisition system in Brazil for an earth observation satellite which is part of a cooperation accord with China. pnt
